meanings.def: a person who is eligible for something or to do something, is able to have or do it because they have the right qualifications, are the right age, etc.
examples: eligible (for something) Only those over 70 are eligible for the special payment.
The new regulations made a lot of prisoners eligible for early release.
You are not considered eligible for legal aid.
eligible (to do something) When are you eligible to vote in your country?

meanings.def: an eligible young man or woman is thought to be a good choice as a husband/wife, usually because they are rich or attractive
